com.ssdd.ntp.service

Class NTPService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ssdd.ntp.service.NTPService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NTPServiceProxy

    @Singleton
 @Path(value="/ntp")
public class NTPService
extends java.lang.Object
    NTP service to deploy in Apache Tomcat 7.0.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Héctor Sánchez San Blas, Francisco Pinto Santos

    • Method Detail

      • buildProxy

        public static NTPService buildProxy(java.lang.String host)
        factory method, to build a proxy to access an instance of this service in remote.
        Parameters:
        host - the IP adress and PORT of server in which the service is allocated.
        Returns:
        NTPServiceProxy to serve as proxy for the /ntp service, served in the given host

      • buildServiceUri

        public static java.lang.String buildServiceUri(java.lang.String host)
        factory method, to build a URI for a NTPService from the host IP and port.
        Parameters:
        host - the IP adress and PORT of server in which the service is allocated.
        Returns:
        String containing the URI to the service, served in the given host

      • status

        @GET
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
 @Path(value="/status")
public java.lang.String status()
        shows service status.
        Returns:
        string indicating the status of the service is up.

      • time

        @GET
 @Path(value="/time")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public java.lang.String time()
        samples the time twice separated by a random interval and returns it in a time1_time2 format.
        Returns:
        the two samples formatted into "time1_time2" if succeed. If it fails returns "0_0".
        See Also:
        System.currentTimeMillis()
